Module downfall
Package net.dragondelve.util

Class DownfallUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dragondelve.downfall.util.DownfallUtil
  • public final class DownfallUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility Class of the application. It defines a lot of static parameters that should not change. This class is not instatiable if you want to get its only instance use getInstance() method.

      • loadImage

        public javafx.scene.image.Image loadImage​(java.lang.String pathname)
        Loads an image from a given pathname. Lightweight method. Quickly constructs a URL by adding "file:" to a given pathname and returns a new image made from that URL
        Parameters:
        pathname - pathname to an image file
        Returns:
        Image loaded from the pathname.

      • informOfMalformedURL

        private void informOfMalformedURL​(java.lang.String URL)
        Informs the logger that a given URL seems to be malformed.
        Parameters:
        URL - URL that returned a MalformedURException upon being constructed
